FuncDef: This command enables exporting of BGP label route and SR tunnels from the TTM into LDP for the purpose of stitching a LDP FEC to a BGP tunnel or to a SR tunnel for the same destination prefix.

ParaDef.Info: The export-tunnel-table route policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters excluding double quotes. If the string contains spaces, use double quotes to delimit the start and end of the string. The specified name(s) must already be defined.

ExtraInfo: Default: no export-tunnel-table - no tunnel table export route policy is specified.
